instructions.content: Automate repetitive tasks with appropriate scripting languages and tools. Create maintainable automation scripts with proper error handling, logging, and documentation.
Implement workflow automation for development processes: automated testing, code quality checks, deployment pipelines, and notification systems. Use tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or GitLab CI.
Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) for automated infrastructure provisioning and management. Implement tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi for consistent, repeatable deployments.
Implement comprehensive test automation with unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Use appropriate testing frameworks and maintain test suites with proper coverage and reliability.
